name: Cible To The Rescue
description:
This game is about a magical girl named Cible. She watches over all the creatures of the woods she lives in and protects them from demonic predators. Recently her dragon friend passed away and Cible decided to raise her eggs. Unfortunately, the eggs were stolen! Now it is up to her to rescue the defenseless eggs from their captors.

Use the Keypad to move and Space to jump or double jump. 

Collect all the eggs to win and use the flags as checkpoints. Once you die fifteen times its game over.
